* My
  Community

  + **[City Hall On-Demand](https://www.cityofcorinth.com/communications/page/city-hall-demand)**
  + [Upcoming City Events](https://www.cityofcorinth.com/special-events)



The City of Corinth is proud to host a variety of free, family-friendly events throughout the year designed to bring our community together and create meaningful experiences for all ages!
